name: backapp-agent
description: BackApp backup agent for client-side backup execution

scripts.install-service: node -e "console.log('Run install script: services/macos/install.sh or services/linux/install.sh')"
scripts.uninstall-service: node -e "console.log('Run uninstall script: services/macos/uninstall.sh or services/linux/uninstall.sh')"

author: BackApp
